metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.code_html:
char myGrade = 'B';
System.out.println(myGrade);

content.text: The char keyword is a data type that is used to store a single character.
content.html: The char keyword is a data type that is used to store a single character.

content.text: A char value must be surrounded by single quotes, like 'A' or 'c'.
content.html: A char value must be surrounded by single quotes, like 'A' or 'c'.

content.text: Read more about data types in our Java Data Types Tutorial .
content.html: Read more about data types in our Java Data Types Tutorial.
